original_text: Were you a slave when you were called? Don’t let it trouble you—although if you can gain your freedom, do so.
korean_text: 네가 종으로 있을 때에 부르심을 받았느냐 염려하지 말라 그러나 네가 자유롭게 될 수 있거든 그것을 이용하라

sentences.original_text: Were you a slave when you were called?
although if you can gain your freedom
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 네가 자유를 얻을 수 있더라도
